typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fffffff',
		StreamEnd as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fffffff',
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
